abstract: T. Boone Pickens, whose hedge fund posted steep losses last year, is seeking new investors in BP Capital, which has risen as much as 79 percent so far this year, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: T. Boone Pickens, whose hedge fund posted steep losses last year, is seeking new investors in BP Capital, which has risen as much as 79 percent so far this year, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: T. Boone Pickens, whose hedge fund endured steep losses last year, is now seeking new investors in BP Capital , which has risen as much as 79 percent this year, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Pickens Said to Seek New Fund Investors
